sentence.Network_en: The sound track did not synchronize with the action.
The film does not synchronize with sound.
sentence.Network_cn: 该影片画面与声音不同步.

sentence.Network_en: The sound on a film must synchronize with the action.
sentence.Network_cn: 影片中的声音必须与动作配合一致.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...-.cop-.con-.cor-.co-，表示“共同、一起”的意思。如：co-operate（合作）syn-，sym-表示“同、共、和、类”如：synchronize（使同步），sympathy（同情）后缀方面的一些例子：
...冲突。这时候，我们需要引入线程“同步”机制，即各位线程之间要有个先来后到，不能一窝蜂挤上去抢作一团。同步这个词是从英文synchronize（使同时发生）翻译过来的。我也不明白为什么要用这个很容易引起误解的词。既然大家都这么用，咱们也就只好这么将就。线程同步的真实意思和字面意思恰好相反。线程同步的真实意思，其实是“排队”：几个线程之间要排队，一个一.

entry.tran: (使)同步;(使)在时间上一致;(使)同速进行
entry.def: If you synchronize two activities, processes, or movements, or if you synchronize one activity, process, or movement with another, you cause them to happen at the same time and speed as each other.

example.ex: It was virtually impossible to synchronise our lives so as to take holidays and weekends together...
example.tran: 想让我们的生活步调保持一致好一起去度假和过周末几乎是不可能的事。

example.ex: Synchronise the score with the film action.
example.tran: 将配乐和电影情节进行同步合成。

means.word_mean: 1. make synchronous and adjust in time or manner;
3. make (motion picture sound) exactly simultaneous with the action;
4. arrange or represent events so that they co-occur;
6. cause to indicate the same time or rate;

auth_sentence.content: His effective government will synchronize with the commencement of his reign.

stems_affixes.word_buile: chrono=chron时间+logical逻辑的→根据时间的逻辑来排列
syn共同+chron时间+ous……的→adj.同期的;同步的
chron时间+ology学科→有关时间的学科
chrono=chron时间+meter测量→测量时间→记时器
syn共同+chron时间+ize表动词→时间相同→同时发生

means.word_mean: 把(钟表)拨至相同的时间;校准

sentences.cn: 把你们的表校到同一时间。

sentences.en: The timing of the gun was precisely synchronized with the turning of the plane’s propeller.
sentences.cn: 风门的调速与飞机螺旋桨的转动精确同步。
